text: Circus () is a 1936 Soviet comedy movie directed by Grigori Aleksandrov.Этот безумный «Цирк». Что окружало фильм АлександроваЦирк It stars Lyubov Orlova, James Patterson, and Sergei Stolyarov. == Actors == * Lyubov Orlova as Marion Dixon * James Patterson as Jimmy, Marion's baby * Sergei Stolyarov as Ivan Petrovich Martynov * Pavel Massalsky as Franz von Kneisсhitz == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1936 comedy movies Category:Soviet comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Grigori Aleksandrov
title: Circus (1936 movie)
